g:HTMLPanel.p: This project is a demonstration of accessing some Google APIs modules using the project gwtgapi an GWT Java API for accessing google's APIs directly from the client.
It also uses other projects of this same author like gwteditors and for automatic editor GUI creation and gwtjsutil for easy GWT wrapping the JavaScript library google-api-javascript-client

ul.li: No third party serverside - your browser talk directly to google's servers
